[[קִינוֹתֵיהֶם]] v:2Ch 35:25;—elegy, dirge 2Sa 1:17, Ez Eze 19:14, Eze 19:14, Eze 32:16, pl. 2Ch 35:25; sg. ‖[[אֵבֶל ]] Am 8:10, ‖[[הֶגֶה וׇהִי ]] Ez Eze 2:10, ´[[נשׂא ק]]: Je 7:29, c. [[עַל]] for, Am 5:1, Je 9:9, Ez Eze 26:17, Eze 27:2, Eze 28:12, Eze 32:2; c. [[אֶל]] Ez Eze 19:1, Eze 27:32; ´[[למּד ק]]: Je 9:19 (‖[[נֶהִי ]]); pl. as collection of written dirges 2Ch 35:25.—Bu:ZAW ii (1882), 1 ff. cf. iii (1883), 299 ff. thinks Kina rhythm always 3 + 2 tone-beats, but book La (Heb. [[קִינוֹת]]) is in all parts pentam., 3 + 2 varying sts. With 2 + 3, yet always 5 in line, with caesura; of other [[קִינוֹת]], Am 5:2 Ez Eze 19:2 ff. Eze 26:17 b ff. are pent., 2Sa 1:19 ff. 2Sa 3:33 f. tetr., Ez Eze 27:3 ff. Eze 28:12 ff. Eze 32:2 ff. hex.; v. Br:Gen.Intr. 379 ff.
